scripts.init: npm run install && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.seed: source backend_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python create_test_data.py && python create_admin_user.py
scripts.dev:backend: source backend_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python manage.py runserver
scripts.install: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.migrate: source backend_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: source backend_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.superuser: source backend_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python manage.py createsuperuser
